title: Towards an In-Depth Comprehension of Case Relevance for Better Legal Retrieval
abstract: arXiv:2404.00947v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Legal retrieval techniques play an important role in preserving the fairness and equality of the judicial system. As an annually well-known international competition, COLIEE aims to advance the development of state-of-the-art retrieval models for legal texts. This paper elaborates on the methodology employed by the TQM team in COLIEE2024.Specifically, we explored various lexical matching and semantic retrieval models, with a focus on enhancing the understanding of case relevance. Additionally, we endeavor to integrate various features using the learning-to-rank technique. Furthermore, fine heuristic pre-processing and post-processing methods have been proposed to mitigate irrelevant information. Consequently, our methodology achieved remarkable performance in COLIEE2024, securing first place in Task 1 and third place in Task 3. We anticipate that our proposed approach can contribute valuable insights to the advancement of legal retrieval

translated_title: 为了更好的法律检索，深入理解案例相关性
translated_abstract: 法律检索技术在维护司法公平和平等中起着重要作用。作为一项国际知名的年度比赛，COLIEE旨在推动法律文本最先进检索模型的发展。本文详细阐述了TQM团队在COLIEE2024中采用的方法论。具体而言，我们探索了各种词汇匹配和语义检索模型，重点关注提升案例相关性的理解。此外，我们致力于利用学习排序技术集成各种特征。此外，提出了精细的启发式预处理和后处理方法以减少无关信息。因此，我们的方法在COLIEE2024取得了显著的表现，在任务1中获得第一名，在任务3中获得第三名。我们期望我们提出的方法能为法律检索的进步提供有价值的见解。
tldr: 本文详细阐述了TQM团队在COLIEE2024中探索的词汇匹配、语义检索模型和学习排序技术，重点在于提升案例相关性的理解。他们的方法在COLIEE2024比赛中取得了显著成绩，并有望为法律检索领域带来有价值的启示。

Their approach achieved remarkable performance in COLIEE2024, offering valuable insights for the advancement of legal retrieval.
